text.content: María looked in the mirror before her school date.
She only had 20 minutes before class.
Desperate, she grabbed a rag with light color flowers.
She used it to cover her hair.
She ran upstairs to check her pony tail.
Her brother Carlos laughed from the doorway.
María felt envious of boys' simple hair care.
Brushing her hair helped a little.
It wasn't perfect, but better than the flowery cover.
She ran to school, hoping no one would notice.
